term.title: eclipsed (eclipsing)

item.text: Two atoms or groups attached to adjacent atoms are said to be eclipsed if the torsion angle between the three bonds is zero (or approximately so).

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2193. 'Basic terminology of stereochemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2206 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122193)
